name: Ultimate Gamer
description: Multiplayer game, with a authentication system using Playfab to create and store account details in order to sign into the game. The game is also multiplayer using Photons free package which can hold up to 20 concurrent players at a time . There are 2 obstacle courses and a FPS style arcade shooter with paintball guns. Gather the highest score across all 3 sections to be the 'Ultimate Gamer'.
